Text:
I think you deserve a thank you as a great "A State of Trance" uploader, even when I prefer the split tracks! ;-)

Thank you!
Ah thanks!! I was looking for it not separated!! I don't like it separated, it cuts the flow man!!!
DUDE you are absolutely THE SH*T!!!! I could drive across the US and back again listening to this!  WAYYY better uncut!
